channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin

item.title: CVE-2022-20616|2024-08-03T02:17:52.979Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20credentials%20binding%20plugin
item.description: Jenkins Credentials Binding Plugin 1.27 and earlier does not perform a permission check in a method implementing form validation, allowing attackers with Overall/Read access to validate if a credential ID refers to a secret file credential and whether it's a zip file.
